oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Baird, Emily C. B., 1904 August 18
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Original wills of husband and wife, Mrs. Emily C. B. Baird and A. J. Baird, of Davidson County, Tennessee. Illustrates the first page of the document (Mrs. Emily C. B. Baird’s will of April 26, 1899). Mrs. Baird’s will was probated in Davidson County August 18th, 1904 in Will Book 36:194; MB 8:201. Includes an original will of A. J. Baird, dated June 3rd, 1884. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baird family; Baird, Emily C. B.; Baird, A. J.
